|`AuditLogs` |Audit Logs |[ASCAuditLogs](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ascauditlogs)<p>Contains audit logs generated by Azure Sphere service and devices. Logs can be used for audit and troubleshooting.|Yes|No||Yes |
